credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22 x 20 cm (8 11/16 x 7 7/8 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: weft-faced plain weave
description: Sample in plain weave with paired, unpaired, tripled plus quadrupled warp for weft-faced plain weave. Warp has stripes of light and four-ply cotton and white two-ply synthetic. Weft has bands of combined shiny, flat black synthetic, pink yarn, red yarn, white yarn and textured white woven braid. Basically, white warps operate singly and red warps are alternately paired and unpaired.
name: Sample
